c2effect.name: 16 color replacer
c2effect.description: Replace up to 16 colors in the image.
c2effect.author: Andre Silva (@andreyin)

param.name: Intensity
param.description: How much of the effect to apply, from 0 (none) to 1 (all) or beyond.

param.name: Tolerance
param.description: From 0 to 100. Increase to also replace colors close to the source color.

param.name: R1 Source
param.description: Red color to replace, from 0 to 255.

param.name: G1 Source
param.description: Green color to replace, from 0 to 255.

param.name: B1 Source
param.description: Blue color to replace, from 0 to 255.

param.name: R2 Source
param.description: Red color to replace, from 0 to 255.

param.name: G2 Source
param.description: Green color to replace, from 0 to 255.
